thread.title: Meet Andbot, a Social Robot That Will Change The Way You View Robots, Launches on Indiegogo
thread.title_full: Meet Andbot, a Social Robot That Will Change The Way You View Robots, Launches on Indiegogo

author: Lee
title: Meet Andbot, a Social Robot That Will Change The Way You View Robots, Launches on Indiegogo
text:
Introducing Andbot, a Social Robot where imagination meets reality. Its humanoid design allows for a full range of hand/arm motions and functionalities. And with the addition of the Accessory Subscription Service option, subscribers will be able to unlock Andbot’s potentials with monthly add-on modules (ie. vacuum attachment, beer holder, and dart-board entertainment). Exclusively for the Indiegogo campaign, backers will be able to sign up for a down-payment option ($199) or a 3-month/6-month Own-A-Robot Program plan, depending on their preference. The Andbot Indiegogo campaign is expected to launch on September 15th, 2015.
Humanoid Design
Robots have been around for some time, but not many can offer the human likeness as Andbot, where its arms can move 90 degree up/down and hands can rotate 360 degree. With its full range of motion, imagine the possibilities in movement and functionality.
Safe-Guard Your Family
Protecting our love ones is always a top priority. With Andbot’s multitude of advance sensors, users will be able to monitor their home for dangerous alerts such as fire, flood, gas, and intrusions. Andbot is the new option to home protection.
Developer Friendly
The introduction of any new technology requires the support of a strong developer community. Our developer edition will provide full access to Andbot’s comprehensive development kit, including SDK and sample documentations.
Exclusive Offers
Andbot comes with an easy down payment option and the exclusive 3 and 6-month Own-A-Robot Program, Indiegogo backers can select the plan that best fits them without breaking the bank.
Call to Action
Please join the Andbot social robot movement and help us spread the word. We are currently gathering supporters and will officially launch the Indiegogo campaign on September 15th, 2015. Together let’s make Andbot a reality!
Notes to members of the media:
Name: Andbot
Campaign page: http://bit.ly/andbot4u
Funding goal: $150,000
Duration: 30 days
Press kit link: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/02vrilmgebzuwe6/AABgv6s4sjurB_SyERdu4DQfa?dl=0
